pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Representation: Bayesian Approach That's Sparse // Feed longitudinal data into a Bayesian Latent Factor Model to obtain a low-rank representation. Parameters are estimated using a Hamiltonian Monte Carlo algorithm with STAN. See G. Weinrott, B. Fontez, N. Hilgert and S. Holmes, "Bayesian Latent Factor Model for Functional Data Analysis", Actes des JdS 2016.
